D. Rahul Tiwari is portrayed by Aftab Shivdasani.
Answer: Aftab Shivdasani plays the character Rahul Tiwari., Aftab Shivdasani is the lead actor in 'Kya Yehi Pyaar Hai'., Rahul Tiwari is portrayed by Aftab Shivdasani.
